item.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
item.description: Trees Binary Search Trees BST: Binary Search Tree how to build a BST operations: search, insert, and delete an item complexity of every operation Balanced BST motivation to balance a binary tree also known as AVL trees, AVL stands for two people: Adelson-Velskii and Landis and was proposed in 1962 in the paper An algorithm for the organization of information also known as height balanced tree advantages: search disadvantages: insert and delete how to merge and split?
